# APCalign-app

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

'APCalign-app' is a Shiny interface to the ['APCalign' R package](https://traitecoevo.github.io/APCalign/).
The app enables users to standardise their plant taxa names to current, accepted standards by the [Australian Plant Census (APC)](Australian Plant Census (APC))

To run the app:

```{r run}
# install.packages("APCalign")
# remotes::install_github("traitecoevo/APCalign")

library(shiny)

runApp("align-app")
```
